<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tlil Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2356)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Colorful, beaded _tlil masks_ are commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can also be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

<document level="2" id="action-1903" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Tlil Mask (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The effect lasts for 10 minutes.
name: Tlil Mask
